project.objective:
The project addresses the two activities in the context of innovation support (H2020) in the services Enterprise Europe Network; “To enhance the innovation management capacity of SMEs” and “Key Account Management under SME Instrument of H2020”. The overall objective of Project is improving the innovation management capacity of promising SMEs in the region of East Marmara in Turkey.
Two work packages are defined for each two activities. With service of enhancing the innovation management capacity of SMEs, the consortium expect to serve to 28 SMEs with 7 days work packages and to spent 1456 working hours. Service of Key Account Management under SME Instrument of H2020 is projected for at most 2 companies. If these are proceed to complete two phase of process total 112 working hours will be spent.
project.title: INNOVATION MANAGEMENT SERVICE SUPPORT OF EAST MARMARA NETWORK
